ground_truth.thought: 获取该客户的收入和负债情况
ground_truth.name: IncomeDebt.get_details

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'CreditReport.get_report', 'description': 'Get the credit report of a customer.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'customer_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the customer'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the credit report of the customer'}]}, {'name': 'IncomeDebt.get_details', 'description': 'Get the income and debt details of a customer.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'customer_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the customer'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'income', 'description': 'the income details of the customer'}, {'name': 'debt', 'description': 'the debt details of the customer'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_score', 'description': 'Get the credit score of a customer.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'customer_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the customer'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'score', 'description': 'the credit score of the customer'}]}, {'name': 'LoanApproval.get_recommendation', 'description': 'Get loan approval recommendations based on credit evaluation.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'customer_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the customer'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendation', 'description': 'the loan approval recommendation'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名信贷分析师，正在评估某客户的信用贷款申请。首先，我需要获取该客户的信用报告。然后，我需要获取该客户的收入和负债情况。接下来，我需要获取该客户的信用评分。最后，我需要基于信用评估提供一些贷款审批建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取该客户的信用报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'customer_id'的值是什么?
{'report': 'The customer has a history of timely payments and no delinquencies.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The customer has a history of timely payments and no delinquencies.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 获取该客户的收入和负债情况。
